import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Badge, Button, Card, Navbar, Nav, Table, Container, Row, Col, Alert, } from "react-bootstrap"; import api from "services/api"; function TableList() { const [data, setData] = React.useState([]); const getJobs = async () => { const response = await api.get('/ong/listMyJobs'); const { data } = response.data; setData(data); } useEffect(() => { getJobs(); }, []) return ( <> Striped Table with Hover

Here is a subtitle for this table

{ data.map(job => { return ( { window.alert(job.id); }} > ) }) }
ID Cargo Data de Expiração Status Região
{job.id} {job.office} {job.expiration_date} {job.status === true ? 'Preenchida' : 'Nao preenchida'} {job.region ? job.region : 'Nao informado'}

5 Doris Greene $63,542 Malawi Feldkirchen in Kärnten
6 Mason Porter $78,615 Chile Gloucester
*/} ); } export default TableList;
